title: Soo with Azir now

replies.body:
uh....not heimerdinger....they only take 1 melee attack to kill
or any aoe spell

-

{{item:3056}} is already set to disable Azir's Sun Discs, but currently on the PBE there's either a bug, or the interaction just hasn't been programmed in yet

Jinx's Passive 'Get Excited' also will activate when she destroy's a Sun Disc, but is also not working on the PBE at the moment

But when heimer uses zhonyas and ULT his turret, You're dead meat. He's by far one of the most annoying. With no health he can just let his turret kill your while you have full health. he gets away just fine.

And this, ladies and gents, is why you play nunu/cho'gath with smite against heimer.

*Turret where? That's right, I turret down.*

*tore it

I'll show myself out now.

Pun intended?
In general heimer is hard to counter. even if you take his turrets down, hes still got many long ranged skills that take you out easily

In general, I agree with you. A champ with that much zone control doesn't need a 273% AP, long-range nuke on his ult (w).

The counterplay *should* be to engage on him after he misses a w or e, because his cooldowns are LONG (like lux), but you also need to take down his turrets, which means you also need to run down his supply of turrets first, which gives him time to get off another W-E rotation and force you back.

That is to say, azir is what heimer should be.

Yeah, he definitely needs some more rounding out. 3 turrets, super strong poke, and long range. with some knowledge you can not be killed unless targeted hard by the enemy team. 1v2's are even easy for a heimer. i think 1v3 is where he falls off but of course, unless fed. Just zhonya and ult. Watch the triple kills and possible pentas arise.
It has been confirmed that Ohmwrecker's active will work against Azir's Sun Discs, but that it has not been hooked up yet. Just another bug to Riot's To-Do list.
